name: CHOIR
description:
The universe as you know is gone. At the end of times, all hope lies with the last survivor of an antique civilization, destined to save reality. Now, assemble your weapons and plan your sequence to defend the prophesied Hero from the Relentless Horde and compose your epic masterpiece in CHOIR, a melody-maker Tower Defense roguelike.

  • Explore a dozen of unique weapons, upgrade and modify them to create new behaviours.
  • Combine different weapon effects to create a  synergistic arsenal.
  • Stand against an ever growing numbers of enemies that get stronger with every decision you make.
